info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: as a first time using air bnb the experience satisfactory. The host was empathetic and the manager was helpful as well in absence of the host. The apartment was well furnished and had a touch of serenity in surrounding area.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
It was my second time stay at this place.
Totally worth it. The place improved a lot. Thanks to the host. Will stay again when I come back to Bangladesh!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: English communication may be a bit of a problem, but everything else is fine! Great value for money in Uttara.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
For the price it's worth it. No complain. But as host mentioned this is not a very clean place. All the furniture and floor felt like they were never been cleaned. I saw thick layer of dust everywhere, left over soap / shampoo packets in bathroom that's attached to bedroom. Also, sink tap didn't have any running water there ( dripping). Bigger bedroom AC doesn't work that well. Took forever to cool down the room.
I didn't have much expectations anyway. Lots of host don't live in the area (sometimes overseas) and someone else maintain the property in Bangladesh. And from my experience i have seen that caretaker lies to host saying it's nice and clean and bla bla bla. But they don't know that just because no one is staying there for a week or month doesn't mean that the place is clean!
No complain to host. He is an awesome guy. I checked in at 3am without any problem. Spacious flat. Close to airport. For the price i paid (thirty nine usd per night) can't complain.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: place was very neat and clean. hope to visit once again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2022,  · Stayed one night
Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed one night
Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Quiet and clean property. kamal the manager was very tentative to all of our needs. thank you. this was my first Airbnb experience in Bangladesh and I'm glad I chose this property.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2021,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
A very nice place to stay. AC works great and the place was very clean. Mr.Kamal the gate guard was A+ help. Everything is close buy and airport is only 10 min a way. We had a early morning flight so it was grate.
I highly recommend this place if you travel to Dhaka. Nice and clean place.

rating_comment: Very nice place at affordable price. Highly recommended.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2021,  · Stayed one night
Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The place is extremely close to the airport and apartment is in a nice locality. You get the whole place to yourself. The apartment is just beautiful.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2020,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Our stay at Mohammed's place was extremely pleasant and he was very helpful to us each step of our stay from the check-in to our check-out. Would recommend his flat for anyone who is visiting Dhaka!
The stay was quite nice. The host fulfilled every need. The place has 4 rooms but only one is available for the guests. Apart from some minor disturbances, the stay was quite nice.
